trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> para que seja possível usar o padrão de "ouvinte de eventos fraco" para anexar ouvintes aos eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Para ser ouvintes nesse padrão, os objetos de ouvinte devem implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> na classe que é a origem dos eventos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding uses this <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> so that internal classes that update bindings can attach listeners for a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on an object that is the target of a binding.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] associação de dados usa esse <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> para que as classes internas que atualizam associações podem anexar ouvintes para um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento em um objeto que é o destino de uma associação.

trans-unit.source: This supports notification for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus> mode of data binding, without creating strong references to data binding targets.
trans-unit.target: Isso dá suporte à notificação para o <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus> modo de associação de dados, sem criar forte faz referência aos destinos de vinculação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o manipulador de eventos especificado, que é chamado quando a origem especificada aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> event..
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para especificar o manipulador de eventos que você deseja usar para assinar o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esse método, o objeto de escuta não precisa implementar o <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado como um ouvinte.

trans-unit.source: Adds the provided listener to the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o ouvinte fornecido à lista de ouvintes na origem fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um novo objeto para conter ouvintes do evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto para conter ouvintes do evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos especificado da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove the listener from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto do qual remover o ouvinte.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: O ouvinte a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o ouvinte especificado da lista de ouvintes na origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object on which to start listening for the pertinent <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual começar a escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> pertinente.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event on the given source, attaching an internal class handler to that source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar em busca do evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> na origem fornecida, anexando um manipulador de classe interna a essa origem.

trans-unit.source: The provided source is checked for type to see if it is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , and then adds the class handler for the appropriate event to that source.
trans-unit.target: A fonte fornecida é verificada para o tipo ver se ele está <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , e, em seguida, adiciona o manipulador de classe para o evento apropriado para essa fonte.

trans-unit.source: The source object on which to stop listening for <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem no qual deixar de escutar <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event on the given source.
trans-unit.target: Para de escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> na origem fornecida.
